column4: Hi, what's the best app to listen to internet radio? I remember seeing preloaded long lists to choose from in one app, but I can't remember which one it was.
vlc will do that, sometimes you can find a .pls file that will open with it (di.fm), or just open the site from vlc
but I can't find lists in vlc. Only the input for the stream address.
yeah, I think you need to find em beforehand, there might be sites out there for that. googling around I found http://www.streamfinder.com/
